name: ひいらぎ荘～同じ屋根の下で～
summary: The story is actually about you the player trying to take the deed of the house for this "mysterious boss" guy. The only way to gain the deed and have the girls move out is to go undercover. And this is where your job comes in...
info:
• 开发: PiAS
  • 原画: 野々原幹
  • 平台: Win98/2000/Me/XP
  • 游戏类型: ADV
  • 发行日期: 1999-01-22
  • ブランド: Pias
